0.1.3.name: wordpress/simple-social-widget
0.1.3.description:
This plugin will add a configurable widget to display social media icons in your widget area(s). Icons are 32x32, squared edges, and display inline.

Supported social media links include:

  • Twitter
  • Facebook
  • Google+
  • LinkedIn
  • YouTube
  • Pinterest
  • RSS

** UPGRADE NOTICE ** A change has been made to the social profile links if you are upgrading this plugin from a version prior to 1.0. The Social Media URLs are managed from a new area in the WordPress admin and will require you to enter your URLs again.
